analyzed: shin tu mthun pa gang zhe na ;

analyzed: / chos kyi spyod pa skyon med pa'o //

original: 'di na gtsang ba gang zhe na //
analyzed: 'di na gtsang ba gang zhe na //

analyzed: gang gi yid ni yongs dag pa'o //

original: mkhas par gyur pa gang zhe na //
analyzed: mkhas par gyur pa gang zhe na //

analyzed: bye brag ji bzhin phyed pa'o //

original: gdug pa'i don ni gang zhe na //
analyzed: gdug pa'i don ni gang zhe na //

analyzed: bla ma brnyas byed gang yin pa'o //

analyzed: 'khor ba na ni snying po gang //

analyzed: yang dag don la rnam dpyod nyid //

analyzed: mi yi de nyid thob pa gang //

original: bdag gzhan phan par brtson pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gzhan phan par brtson pa'o //

original: ra ro lta bu'i rmongs pa gang //
analyzed: ra ro lta bu'i rmongs pa gang //

original: phyin ci log la chags pa'o //
analyzed: phyin ci log la chags pa'o //

original: mi srun dgra 'dra gang zhe na //
analyzed: mi srun dgra 'dra gang zhe na //

original: mi bzad pa yi yul rnams so //
analyzed: mi bzad pa yi yul rnams so //

original: 'khor ba'i 'khri shing gang zhe na //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i 'khri shing gang zhe na //

original: log par sred pa dam pa'o //
analyzed: log par sred pa dam pa'o //

original: dgra por gyur pa gang zhe na //
analyzed: dgra por gyur pa gang zhe na //
translated: What is the enemy?

original: yang dag don la brtson med pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag don la brtson med pa'o //

original: 'di la 'jigs pa gang zhe na //
analyzed: 'di la 'jigs pa gang zhe na //
translated: What is the danger here?

original: srog mthar gyur pa'i 'chi ba'o //
analyzed: srog mthar gyur pa'i 'chi ba'o //

original: long ba las kyang long ba gang //
analyzed: long ba las kyang long ba gang //
translated: What is the blindest of the blind?

original: phung khrol 'dod chags can rnams so //
analyzed: phung khrol 'dod chags can rnams so //
translated: The lustful, who are in a state of ruin.

original: skyes bu dpa' bo gang zhe na //
analyzed: skyes bu dpa' bo gang zhe na //
translated: What is the hero?

original: gang zhig bud med mdzas ma la //
analyzed: gang zhig bud med mdzas ma la //
translated: The one who, when a beautiful woman

original: chags pa'i mig gi mda' yis ni //
analyzed: chags pa'i mig gi mda' yis ni //
translated: shoots the arrow of her eye at him,

original: yid la phog par ma gyur pa'o //
analyzed: yid la phog par ma gyur pa'o //
translated: is not struck in the heart.

original: rnar snyan bdud rtsi lta bu gang //
analyzed: rnar snyan bdud rtsi lta bu gang //
translated: What is the nectar-like sound?

original: yang dag don gyi man ngag go //
analyzed: yang dag don gyi man ngag go //
translated: The instruction in the right goal.

original: 'di na lci ba'i rtsa ba gang //
analyzed: 'di na lci ba'i rtsa ba gang //
translated: What is the root of all heaviness here?

original: gang 'di blun par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di blun par gyur pa'o //
translated: It is the one who has become foolish.

original: tshang tshing mi bzad gang zhe na //
analyzed: tshang tshing mi bzad gang zhe na //
translated: What is the unbearable thicket?

original: bud med rnams kyi spyod pa'o //
analyzed: bud med rnams kyi spyod pa'o //
translated: The behavior of women.

original: shin tu sgrin pa gang zhe na //
analyzed: shin tu sgrin pa gang zhe na //
translated: What is the most clever?

original: gang gis des dral ma gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gang gis des dral ma gyur pa'o //
translated: The one who is not pierced by it.

original: 'di na dbul po gang zhe na //
analyzed: 'di na dbul po gang zhe na //
translated: What is the poorest here?

original: gang zhig chog shes med pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig chog shes med pa'o //
translated: The one who is not content.

original: shin tu yangs pa gang zhe na //
analyzed: shin tu yangs pa gang zhe na //
translated: What is the most spacious?

original: gzhan ltos slong mo pa rnams so //
analyzed: gzhan ltos slong mo pa rnams so //
translated: The beggars who depend on others.

original: don yod 'tsho ba gang zhe na //
analyzed: don yod 'tsho ba gang zhe na //
translated: What is a meaningful life?

original: kha na ma tho med pa'o //
analyzed: kha na ma tho med pa'o //
translated: It is a life free from sin.

original: skyes bu glen pa gang zhe na //
analyzed: skyes bu glen pa gang zhe na //
translated: What is a fool?

original: mkhas bya'i yul la mi slob pa'o //
analyzed: mkhas bya'i yul la mi slob pa'o //
translated: It is one who does not learn from the wise.

original: gnyid kyis ma log gang zhe na //
analyzed: gnyid kyis ma log gang zhe na //
translated: What is one who is not asleep?

original: ma rmongs don gyi bye brag shes //
analyzed: ma rmongs don gyi bye brag shes //
translated: It is one who is not confused and who knows the distinctions of the meaning.

original: gnyid kyis log pa gang zhe na //
analyzed: gnyid kyis log pa gang zhe na //
translated: What is one who is asleep?

original: skyes bu shin tu rmongs pa'o //üîΩpadma'i 'dab chags chu thigs ltar //
analyzed: skyes bu shin tu rmongs pa'o // padma'i 'dab chags chu thigs ltar //
translated: It is one who is very confused.

original: mi brtan myur 'jig gang zhe na //
analyzed: mi brtan myur 'jig gang zhe na //
translated: What is unstable and quickly destroyed like a drop of water on a lotus leaf?

original: skyes bu rnams kyi lang tsho dang // nor dang de bzhin tshe nyid do //
analyzed: skyes bu rnams kyi lang tsho dang // nor dang de bzhin tshe nyid do //
translated: It is the youth, wealth, and life of people.

original: zla tshes lta bu'i yid 'ong gang //
analyzed: zla tshes lta bu'i yid 'ong gang //
translated: What is pleasing like the crescent moon?

original: skye bo dam pa phan 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: skye bo dam pa phan 'dod pa'o //
translated: It is the desire to help good people.

original: @127a * // dmyal dang 'dra ba gang zhe na //
analyzed: @127a * // dmyal dang 'dra ba gang zhe na //
translated: What is like hell?

original: gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa'o //
translated: It is being under the control of others.

original: shin tu bde ba gang zhe na //
analyzed: shin tu bde ba gang zhe na //
translated: What is great happiness?

original: 'du 'dzi kun la ma chags pa'o //
analyzed: 'du 'dzi kun la ma chags pa'o //
translated: It is not being attached to all kinds of entertainments.

original: srog chags rnams ni dga' bya gang //
analyzed: srog chags rnams ni dga' bya gang //
translated: What is the delight of living beings?

original: don yod 'tsho ba'i srog nyid do //
analyzed: don yod 'tsho ba'i srog nyid do //
translated: It is a meaningful life.

original: legs par byin pa gang zhe na //
analyzed: legs par byin pa gang zhe na //
translated: What is good giving?

original: lan la re ba med pa'o //
analyzed: lan la re ba med pa'o //
translated: It is to be without hope of reward.

original: mdza' bshes yid 'ong gang zhe na //
analyzed: mdza' bshes yid 'ong gang zhe na //
translated: What is a pleasant friend?

original: gang zhig sdig las zlog byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig sdig las zlog byed pa'o //
translated: It is one who turns one away from evil.

original: mdzes pa'i rgyan ni gang zhe na //
analyzed: mdzes pa'i rgyan ni gang zhe na //
translated: What is a beautiful ornament?

original: gang zhig tshul khrims phun tshogs pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig tshul khrims phun tshogs pa'o //
translated: It is the perfection of morality.

original: tshig gi rgyan gyur gang zhe na //
analyzed: tshig gi rgyan gyur gang zhe na //
translated: What is an ornament of speech?üîΩIt is the truth that does not deceive others.

original: gzhan la mi slu bden pa'i ngag / phung khrol 'bras 'byin gang zhe na //
analyzed: gzhan la mi slu bden pa'i ngag / phung khrol 'bras 'byin gang zhe na //
translated: What is the result of destruction?

original: yid ni kun du ma bsdams pa'o //
analyzed: yid ni kun du ma bsdams pa'o //
translated: It is the mind that is not restrained.

original: bde ba 'thob byed gang zhe na //
analyzed: bde ba 'thob byed gang zhe na //
translated: What is the attainment of happiness?

original: kun la byams shing phan byed pa'o //
analyzed: kun la byams shing phan byed pa'o //
translated: It is to be loving and helpful to all.

original: phongs pa kun 'jig mkhas pa gang //
analyzed: phongs pa kun 'jig mkhas pa gang //
translated: What is the wise one who destroys all poverty?

original: thams cad du ni skal ldan pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad du ni skal ldan pa'o //
translated: It is the one who is fortunate in every way.

original: skyes bu dmus long gang zhe na //
analyzed: skyes bu dmus long gang zhe na //
translated: What is the blind man?

original: bya ba ma yin la dga' ba'o //
analyzed: bya ba ma yin la dga' ba'o //
translated: It is the one who delights in what should not be done.

original: 'on bar gyur pa gang zhe na //
analyzed: 'on bar gyur pa gang zhe na //
translated: What is the deaf man?

original: phan dang mi phan mi nyan pa'o //
analyzed: phan dang mi phan mi nyan pa'o //
translated: It is the one who does not listen to what is beneficial or not beneficial.

original: lce med lkugs pa gang zhe na //
analyzed: lce med lkugs pa gang zhe na //
translated: What is the mute?

original: gang zhig snyan smra mi shes pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig snyan smra mi shes pa'o //
translated: It is the one who does not know how to speak pleasantly.

original: skyes bu 'chi ba gang zhe na //
analyzed: skyes bu 'chi ba gang zhe na //
translated: What is the dead man?

original: glen zhing gti mug can nyid do //
analyzed: glen zhing gti mug can nyid do //
translated: It is the foolish and ignorant one.

original: rin chen gyur pa gang zhe na //
analyzed: rin chen gyur pa gang zhe na //
translated: What is a precious thing?

original: gang zhig dus su byin pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig dus su byin pa'o //
translated: It is what is given at the right time.

original: mi yi zug rngur gyur pa gang //
analyzed: mi yi zug rngur gyur pa gang //
translated: What is a human pain?

original: dben par bya min byas pa'o //
analyzed: dben par bya min byas pa'o //
translated: It is what is done in a secluded place.

original: gang la 'bad bya gang zhe na //
analyzed: gang la 'bad bya gang zhe na //
translated: What is the thing to be striven for?

original: rig pa legs par slob pa dang // sman chen tshul bzhin bsten pa dang // sbyin pa kun du gtong ba'o //
analyzed: rig pa legs par slob pa dang // sman chen tshul bzhin bsten pa dang // sbyin pa kun du gtong ba'o //
translated: It is the proper training in knowledge, the proper reliance on a great physician, and the giving of gifts.

original: ltos med bya ba gang zhe na //
analyzed: ltos med bya ba gang zhe na //
translated: What is the thing to be relied on?

original: 'gro ba mi srun 'dul min dang // chags gyur gzhan gyi bud med dang // 'brel med gzhan gyi nor rnams la'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba mi srun 'dul min dang // chags gyur gzhan gyi bud med dang // 'brel med gzhan gyi nor rnams la'o //
translated: It is the subduing of unruly beings, the non-attachment to others' wives, and the non-stealing of others' wealth.

original: gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su //
analyzed: gang zhig nyin dang mtshan rnams su //
translated: What is the thing to be done day and night?

original: bsam par bya ba gang zhe na //
analyzed: bsam par bya ba gang zhe na //
translated: What is the thing to be contemplated?

original: 'khor ba snying po med nyid la //
analyzed: 'khor ba snying po med nyid la //
translated: It is the contemplation of the essencelessness of cyclic existence.üîΩWhat is the thing to be not neglected?

original: bag med par ni mi bya'o //
analyzed: bag med par ni mi bya'o //
translated: It is the non-neglect of the practice of generosity.

original: yid du 'ong ba gang zhe na //
analyzed: yid du 'ong ba gang zhe na //
translated: What is the thing to be desired?

original: g-yo med kun du snying rjer ldan //
analyzed: g-yo med kun du snying rjer ldan //
translated: It is the desire for a mind free from deceit and full of compassion.

original: sbyin par bya ba gang zhe na //
analyzed: sbyin par bya ba gang zhe na //
translated: What is the thing to be given?

original: byams pa'i sems dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: byams pa'i sems dang yang dag ldan //
translated: It is the giving of gifts with a mind full of love.

original: lkog mar srog phyin gyur kyang ni //
analyzed: lkog mar srog phyin gyur kyang ni //
translated: Even if the life-force enters the throat,

original: bdag dang mi 'bral gang zhe na //
analyzed: bdag dang mi 'bral gang zhe na //
translated: What is it that one should not be separated from?

original: glen pa skyon ni ldan pa dang // kun gnod byas pa mi gzo ba'o //
analyzed: glen pa skyon ni ldan pa dang // kun gnod byas pa mi gzo ba'o //
translated: Being stupid and having faults, and not repaying harm done to oneself.

original: mchod par bya ba gang zhe na //
analyzed: mchod par bya ba gang zhe na //
translated: What is it that one should worship?

original: legs pa rnams la 'dzud pa'o //
analyzed: legs pa rnams la 'dzud pa'o //
translated: It is the one who introduces one to the good.

original: tha shal du ni shes bya gang //üîΩrtsom pa kun la mi brtan pa'o //
analyzed: tha shal du ni shes bya gang // rtsom pa kun la mi brtan pa'o //
translated: What is it that one should know to be low?

original: 'gro ba kun la thams cad las //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun la thams cad las //
translated: It is the one who is not steadfast in all undertakings.

original: nges par rgyal ba gang zhe na //
analyzed: nges par rgyal ba gang zhe na //
translated: What is it that is victorious over all?

original: skyes bu bden par smra ba dang // bzod pa yang dag ldan pa'o //
analyzed: skyes bu bden par smra ba dang // bzod pa yang dag ldan pa'o //
translated: It is the person who speaks the truth and is endowed with patience.

original: lhas kyang gus pas phyag bya gang //
analyzed: lhas kyang gus pas phyag bya gang //
translated: What is it that the gods also respectfully salute?

original: snying rje gtso bor byed pa'o //
analyzed: snying rje gtso bor byed pa'o //
translated: It is the one who makes compassion primary.

original: @127b gang la skyo bar bya zhe na //üîΩmkhas pas 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon las //
analyzed: @127b gang la skyo bar bya zhe na // mkhas pas 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon las //
translated: What is it that one should be weary of?

original: srog chags rnams kyi tshogs dag ni //
analyzed: srog chags rnams kyi tshogs dag ni //
translated: The wise one should be weary of the wilderness of cyclic existence.üîΩWhat is it that one should gather?üîΩIt is the accumulation of merit and wisdom.

original: gang gi dbang du 'gyur zhe na //
analyzed: gang gi dbang du 'gyur zhe na //
translated: What is it that one should bring under control?

original: gang zhig phan dang snyan smra dang // dul bar spyod pa rnams kyis so //üîΩskyes bu legs par 'dod pa yis //
analyzed: gang zhig phan dang snyan smra dang // dul bar spyod pa rnams kyis so // skyes bu legs par 'dod pa yis //
translated: It is the one who is beneficial, pleasant, and well-disciplined.

original: gang la gnas par bya zhe na //
analyzed: gang la gnas par bya zhe na //
translated: What is it that a person who desires goodness should rely on?

original: mthong dang ma mthong bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: mthong dang ma mthong bya ba'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of being seen or not being seen,

original: bden pa'i lam la nges gnas bya //
analyzed: bden pa'i lam la nges gnas bya //
translated: one should abide in the path of truth.

original: mya ngan 'gyur ba gang zhe na //
analyzed: mya ngan 'gyur ba gang zhe na //
translated: What is sorrow?

original: 'byor ba bzhin du zhen pa'o //
analyzed: 'byor ba bzhin du zhen pa'o //
translated: It is attachment to prosperity.

original: glog ltar mi brtan gang zhe na //
analyzed: glog ltar mi brtan gang zhe na //
translated: What is like lightning?

original: skyes bu dam pa phrad bsten pa'o //
analyzed: skyes bu dam pa phrad bsten pa'o //
translated: It is the dependence on a holy person.

original: bsngags par bya ba gang zhe na //üîΩgang zhig blo gros che ba dang // shin tu nyam chung stobs med la ;
analyzed: bsngags par bya ba gang zhe na // gang zhig blo gros che ba dang // shin tu nyam chung stobs med la ;
translated: What is praiseworthy?üîΩIt is the patience of one who is powerful

original: / nus dang ldan zhing bzod byed pa'o //
analyzed: / nus dang ldan zhing bzod byed pa'o //
translated: and able to endure the weak-minded.

original: rigs kyi ri ltar mi g-yo gang //
analyzed: rigs kyi ri ltar mi g-yo gang //
translated: What is like a mountain of the clan?

original: rtsod dus skyes bu dam pa'o //üîΩ'di na skyes bus rnyed dka' ba'i //
analyzed: rtsod dus skyes bu dam pa'o // 'di na skyes bus rnyed dka' ba'i //
translated: It is a holy person in the age of dispute.

original: bzang po bzhi ni gang zhe na //
analyzed: bzang po bzhi ni gang zhe na //
translated: What are the four excellencesüîΩthat are difficult for a person to obtain?üîΩThey are generosity, pleasant speech,üîΩknowledge, and patience with the arrogant;üîΩforbearance, effort,

original: sbyin pa snyan smrar bcas pa dang // shes pa khengs pa med ldan dang // bzod pa brtson 'grus bcas pa dang // sems ni rnal 'byor ldan pa'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa snyan smrar bcas pa dang // shes pa khengs pa med ldan dang // bzod pa brtson 'grus bcas pa dang // sems ni rnal 'byor ldan pa'o //
translated: and a mind endowed with yoga.

original: dri med dris lan rin chen phreng ba ni //
analyzed: dri med dris lan rin chen phreng ba ni //
translated: This garland of precious answers to stainless questions,

original: gang gi mgul na legs par yod gyur na //
analyzed: gang gi mgul na legs par yod gyur na //
translated: when it is well placed around the neck,

original: de ni skyes bu mkhas pa 'dus nang du //
analyzed: de ni skyes bu mkhas pa 'dus nang du //
translated: That is the gathering of the wise people.üîΩ

original: mgul gyi mu tig rgyan bzhin mdzes pa yin //üîΩbrtags nas rgyal srid rnam spong ba'i //
analyzed: mgul gyi mu tig rgyan bzhin mdzes pa yin // brtags nas rgyal srid rnam spong ba'i //
translated: It is like a pearl necklace adorning the neck of a gathering of wise people.üîΩThis garland of jewels, a king,

original: rgyal po rin chen phreng ba 'di //üîΩdon yod 'char gyis byas pa ste //
analyzed: rgyal po rin chen phreng ba 'di // don yod 'char gyis byas pa ste //

original: blo bzad dam pa'i rgyan yin no //
analyzed: blo bzad dam pa'i rgyan yin no //

analyzed: dri ma med pa'i dris lan rin po che'i phreng ba zhes bya ba //
translated: The Garland of Jewels: Stainless Answers to Questions

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan pa ka ma la gupta dang // zhu chen gyi lo ts'a pa dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhes te gtan la phab pa//
